name: AlarmNoise
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alarm noise
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alarm Noises lets you reproduce funny and scary alarm sounds.

Alarm Noise earns from qualifying purchases that you make while using this Alexa skill.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

1. Enable this Alexa skill.
2. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
3. Click + to add a new routine.
4. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
5. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
6. Choose "Your Skills".
7. Select this skill.
8. Click Next.
9. Choose Device to perform the routine to.
10. Click Save.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
